creditline:
The William M. Ladd Collection
Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
inscription:
LR recto, in pencil: [1s. state / w26]
LL verso, in pencil: [389]; [a21862]
Verso across bottom of sheet, cursive in pencil: [Whistler]; [Reading by Lamplight (title crossed out and replaced above in new cursive in pencil): [The Music Room]; continues in original cursive, in pencil: [The Rare 1st state; before the hands of Seymour and / Mrs Haden were finished. Before the lady\'s dress was finished in drypoint, etc: / The man at the lamp is Mr. Freer, a friend of Whistler\'s]
markings: Unidentified mark, center verso at bottom of sheet, in pencil: [I/ U O]
title: The Music Room
